alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Kaibab Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 10:57PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Fredonia, Heber-Overgaard, Jacob Lake, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman and Williams. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 10 PM Today to 11 AM Friday: Doney Park 7 to 11 inches Flagstaff 13 to 19 inches Forest Lakes 11 to 17 inches Fredonia 2 to 4 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 3 inches Jacob Lake 7 to 11 inches Prescott 5 to 9 inches Prescott Valley 2 to 4 inches Sedona 2 to 4 inches Seligman 2 to 4 inches Williams 10 to 16 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
